author: Lech Deregowski
comment: This face is so busy that it's difficult to read the time at a glance.

reply.author: Red Bred Inc.
reply.content: It is geometrically designed so you can tell the time if you just look at it a little differently. Otherwise, the option to have the time in numbers visible can be set through the companion app.

title: Too much detail
